headers.subject: [tosdr:3101] Preparing JP version of ToS; DR

html:
Hi!

I'd like to let you know I'm now preparing a Japan version of ToS; DR.  I just began translating & collecting information, but the site is already available at;

http://tosdr-jp.5apps.com (tosdr.jp will be available soon)

For now I concentrate on Japanese companies (and subsidiaries of foreign companies), but will contribute back to the original site if possible.  What else should I do?

Best regards,
MH

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: Preparing JP version of ToS; DR
text:
Hi!

I'd like to let you know I'm now preparing a Japan version of ToS; DR.  I 
just began translating & collecting information, but the site is already 
available at;

http://tosdr-jp.5apps.com (tosdr.jp will be available soon)

For now I concentrate on Japanese companies (and subsidiaries of foreign 
companies), but will contribute back to the original site if possible.  
What else should I do?

Best regards,
MH

--
